channel.title: ## - item help - ##

item.title: ## - item help - ##
item.dc:creator: @Yo_Its_Fear Yo Its Fear
item.description:
@Yo_Its_Fear wrote:

Ok, in Item.java i added the following…

itemStackable[11774] = true;

I added that underneath…

   FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/stackable.dat"));
   while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
    if (c == 0)
     itemStackable[counter] = false;
    else
     itemStackable[counter] = true;
    counter++;
   }
   dataIn.close();

Alright, saved, closed, compiled, runserver… No errors, then when i spawn 11774 - 5000

::pickup 11774 5000

It gives me 5000 backpacks, or 5000 crandor map pieces… Yes i have changed all my items from 10000, to 20000… And i have changed my pickup command… So can anyone tell me why this isn’t working properly plz?..

Appreciated, thanks.

Read full topic
